timeline.message:
pulse: adopt 'Pulse' stats library name

Signed-off-by: Mike Schore <mike.schore@gmail.com>

timeline.bodyText:
Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
            This library (like all of Enovy Mobile) is under active development.
          
          
            
            This library (like all of Envoy Mobile) is under active development.
timeline.author: junr03
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -1,29 +1,32 @@
 .. _api_stats:
 
-Stats
+Pulse
 =====
 
 ---------------
-``StatsClient``
+``PulseClient``
 ---------------
 
-Envoy Mobile's stats functionality currently supports two type of stats: ``Counter`` and ``Gauge``.
+Pulse is Envoy Mobile's stats library, used for capturing client application time series
+metrics. Currently two types of metrics are supported: ``Counter`` and ``Gauge``.
 
-To use Envoy Mobile's stats function, obtain an instance of ``StatsClient`` from ``Engine``
-(refer to :ref:`api_starting_envoy` for building an engine instance), and store the stats client to
+This library (like all of Enovy Mobile) is under active development.

timeline.bodyText: Would it make sense to do Pulse (stats library) here?
timeline.author: rebello95

replies.bodyText: The opening description a couple lines below states it. :)
replies.author: goaway

replies.bodyText: Yeah, the intent was to make it clear at a glance without making the reader scroll for context. Up to you though
replies.author: rebello95
